thread.title: Miss You Already hits NZ screens
thread.title_full: Miss You Already hits NZ screens

title: Miss You Already hits NZ screens
text:
Entertainment Editor 
Thursday 8 Oct 2015 6:46 p.m. 
'Best friends for life' takes on a far more emotional meaning in a new film out in NZ called Miss You Already . 
Starring Drew Barrymore and Toni Collette, it's an unflinching story of how two women deal with terminal illness. 
It would take two intuitive authentic performances to do this story and this central relationship justice. 
And when Collette caught wind of the project, she knew there was only one woman to play her best friend â€“ even though they had never met. 
The film is an intense watch, and director Catherine Hardwicke and her two leads were unafraid to explore the particularly feminine ravages of cancer with a confronting intimacy. 
Watch the video for the full 3 News report.
